inclusion.criterion: Positive for current or recent SARS-CoV-2 infection or COVID-19 exposure within the 4 weeks prior to the onset of symptoms.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Fever ≥38.0 degrees C for ≥24 hours or report of subjective fever lasting 24 hours
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Laboratory evidence of inflammation, including, but not limited to, one or more of the following: an elevated CRP, ESR, fibrinogen, procalcitonin, d-dimer, ferritin, LDH, or IL-6; elevated neutrophils, reduced lymphocytes, low albumin
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Clinically severe disease that requires hospitalization
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Multisystem (≥2) organ involvement: I. Cardiovascular involvement (ANY of the listed criteria)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Evidence of acquired or congenital immunodeficiency (due to immunosuppressive therapy, HIV, previous treatment for cancer, etc.)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a pregnant woman with symptoms consistent with COVID-19 related MIS-C. However, she has no history of recurrent UTI prior to her pregnancy or any other underlying disease.
